name: CircleJumps
description:
A really simple indie game that can be operated only by touch!

When you touch, amazing things happen.
A new world every time you touch
There is a new world at your fingertips.
Indie game to meet at your fingertips !!!!
All of these privileges are free! Exciting new game to meet with free game !!!

It is a simple, addictive game for killing time that does not require explanation ~
